pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![Python application](https://github.com/AndreiPuchko/q2terminal/actions/workflows/main.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/AndreiPuchko/q2terminal/actions/workflows/main.yml)# Interaction with a terminal session```pythonfrom q2terminal.q2terminal import Q2Terminalimport syst = Q2Terminal()t.run("programm", echo=True)assert t.exit_code != 0assert t.run("$q2 = 123") == []assert t.run("echo $q2") == ["123"]if "win32" in sys.platform: t.run("notepad") assert t.exit_code == 0```
